content.prompt: The changing relationship between Portugal and Brazil described in the passage can best be understood in the context of which of the following developments after 1750 ?

choices.label: The onset of Latin American independence movements
The emergence of the Industrial Revolution in Brazil
The expansion of the Portuguese Empire in Central America
The decline of nationalism in Brazil as a popular ideology

skill.text: Skill 4.B: Explain how a specific historical development or process is situated within a broader historical context.
